presetNotes: Pre-summon Meerkats Familiar with scrolls in them. Useful to skip wizards during coordinate clues.

equipmentSlots.name: Wicked hood
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Allows you to teleport to Rune Altars and requires Wicked Hood Tokens to be charged | 
Used for Nature Altar
equipmentSlots.label: wickedhood

equipmentSlots.name: Globetrotter backpack
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Has the ability to teleport directly to the clue scroll location, consuming a charge.

-||as Max Cape Perks stored. 
- Agility Cape on Anachronia stand.
- Quest Point Cape has access to all teleports that were previously locked behind MQC. - The World Gate  is relevant for hard clues.
equipmentSlots.label: globetrotterbackpack

equipmentSlots.name: Dark Shard of Leng
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Precise 6  | Aftershock 1
equipmentSlots.label: lengmh

equipmentSlots.name: Globetrotter jacket
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Has the ability to teleport directly to the clue scroll location, consuming a charge.
equipmentSlots.label: globetrotterjacket

equipmentSlots.name: Dark Sliver of Leng
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Equilibrium 4  | Ruthless 3
equipmentSlots.label: lengoh

equipmentSlots.name: Globetrotter shorts
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: They can be activated from the inventory or while worn to automatically signal for Uri in place of performing an emote for an emote clue. Requires the items or hidey hole to be filled.
equipmentSlots.label: globetrottershorts

equipmentSlots.name: Globetrotter arm guards
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Ability to use teleport scrolls that are stored within the arm guards.

Stored scrolls: Bandit Camp (2) | Clocktower  (3) | Gu'Tanoth (4) | Lighthouse (5) | Fort Forinthry (6, If not usingto Raptor)
equipmentSlots.label: globetrotterarmguards

equipmentSlots.name: Globetrotter boots
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Activate for unlimited running for a randomly selected duration. Only useful for the set bonus.
equipmentSlots.label: globetrotterboots

equipmentSlots.name: Hazelmere's signet ring
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Luck of the Dwarves/HSR + Dark Facet used Dwarven Outpost and Baxtorian Falls. If not owned replace with Dragon Trinkets.
equipmentSlots.label: hsr

equipmentSlots.name: Tirannwn quiver 4
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Tirannwn quiver 3+ | Used for Tyras Camp | Elf Camp
equipmentSlots.label: quiver4

equipmentSlots.name: Scripture of Bik
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Disassemble any stackable/noted item for a chance of procs during a run.
equipmentSlots.label: scriptureofbik

inventorySlots.name: Spade
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Can be keybound for faster digging or closing the  interface by clicking the spade in the inventory.
inventorySlots.label: spade

inventorySlots.name: Portable fairy ring
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: ALQ | DKS | DJP | CKS | CKR | CJS | BKR | AKQ
inventorySlots.label: portablefairyring(used)

inventorySlots.name: Spirit tree re-rooter
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Tree Gnome Village (1) | Tree Gnome Stronghold (2) | Etceteria (7, If not using Enchanted Lyre) | Brimhaven (8)
inventorySlots.label: spirittreere-rooter(used)

inventorySlots.name: Dave's spellbook
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Used for Watchtower | Ardougne | Camelot (If not using Overgrown Idols on )
inventorySlots.label: davesspellbook

inventorySlots.name: Elder overload salve (6)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Can use lantadyme incense sticks to extend potion timers from 6 to 8 minutes.
inventorySlots.label: salve

inventorySlots.name: Portable Obelisk
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Wilderness Steps or  to Ancient Spellbook
inventorySlots.label: portableobelisk

inventorySlots.name: Sceptre of the gods
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Obtained from Pyramid Plunder which has 60 charges for convenience | Used for Jalsavrah (1)
inventorySlots.label: sceptreofthegods

inventorySlots.name: Powerburst of acceleration (4)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Can be used everywhere outside the Wilderness. If you only use 1 powerburst out of 2, you can bring grand seed pods instead. Personal Choice.
inventorySlots.label: accel4

inventorySlots.name: Grasping rune pouch (green)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Cosmic  | Astral  | Law
inventorySlots.label: graspingpouchgreen

inventorySlots.name: Worker district teleport
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Used for Hamid located in the Worker District.
inventorySlots.label: workerdistrictteleport

inventorySlots.name: Amulet of nature
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Bound to the Vine Bush patch in Herblore Habitat (patch condition irrelevant—can be empty, diseased, or fully grown).
inventorySlots.label: amuletofnature

inventorySlots.name: Noted items
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Anything to disassemble for Bik Procs using (Cheap and Stackable)
inventorySlots.label: noteditems

primaryRelics.name: Shadows Grace
primaryRelics.description: Reduces the cooldown of Surge, Escape, Bladed Dive, Dive and Barge by 50%, but these abilities no longer generate adrenaline.
primaryRelics.label: shadowsgrace

primaryRelics.name: Abyssal Link
primaryRelics.description: Teleport spells from the spellbook no longer require runes, but award no magic XP.
primaryRelics.label: abyssallink

primaryRelics.name: Persistent Rage
primaryRelics.description: Your adrenaline now generates outside of combat at a rate of 5% every 1.2 seconds, instead of having it drained.
primaryRelics.label: persistentrage
